name: A benevolent Ruler
description:
In 'A benevolent Ruler' you explore parts of a realm and find the memories of a king and it's subjects. Piece by piece you can patch together parts of the realms history.

Controlls
WASD to move
SPACE to jump
LMB/E to Advance Text
ESCAPE for ingame Menu

The game was created during the 2019 Ubisoft Berlin Game Jam . The Theme of the Jam was "Can we create games without confrontation?".

The game might not run in all browsers. Try the Desktop builds for windows or Linux instead if you have trouble with the web build.
